name: Employee Total Rights
query:
Select tial.employee AS `Employee #`, tial.employee_name AS `Employee Name`, tecn.`Total Employee Contr`,
								tecn.`Total Bank Contr`,tecn.`Total Contrt`, SUM(tial.pl_employee_contr) AS `Total Employee P&L`,
								SUM(tial.pl_bank_contr) AS `Total Bank P&L`,SUM(tial.pl_employee_contr) + SUM(tial.pl_bank_contr) as`Total P&L`, (SUM(tecn.`Total Contrt`) + SUM(tial.pl_bank_contr) ) as`Total Rights`, tia.date AS `Date`
								From `tabIncome Allocation Line` tial
								INNER JOIN `tabIncome Allocation` tia on tia.name = tial.parent
								INNER  JOIN (Select tecl.employee, SUM(tecl.employee_contr) AS `Total Employee Contr`, SUM(tecl.bank_contr) AS `Total Bank Contr`,
								(SUM(tecl.employee_contr)+SUM(tecl.bank_contr)) AS `Total Contrt`
								FROM `tabEmployee Contribution Line` tecl 
								INNER join `tabEmployee Contribution` tec on tecl.parent = tec.name
								GROUP BY tecl.employee ) AS tecn on tial.employee = tecn.employee
								Where tia.docstatus =1
								GROUP BY tial.employee, tial.employee_name,tia.date, tecn.employee, tecn.employee, tecn.`Total Employee Contr`, tecn.`Total Bank Contr`, tecn.`Total Contrt`
